org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Interface Parallelogram

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Shape
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollisionBox, Quad, Rectangle, RegionQuad

    public interface Parallelogram
extends Shape
    A common interface for parallelogram implementations
